subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The role of a patriarch who doles out compassion and criticism to a tarnished son is a familiar one for Joe Torre, who pledged his support to Manny Ramirez on Thursday.
snippet: The role of a patriarch who doles out compassion and criticism to a tarnished son is a familiar one for Joe Torre, who pledged his support to Manny Ramirez on Thursday.
